about_the_game:
Do you still remember that classic Solitaire game on Windows? How long has it been since you last played it?

If you still have feelings for it, then now, it's time to open up 'Beauty Solitaire'!

This game, based on the classic gameplay, allows you to relive the fun of the solitaire game in a relaxing and enjoyable manner, through cute girl-themed cards, exquisite game graphics, and heart-touching melodies.

If you think the game lacks excitement, you can also choose the rank mode to compete with players worldwide in terms of the speed of passing through the game, or constantly challenge your own limit of speed in passing through the game.

Game Features:

  • 52 cards featuring charming girl portraits.
  • 30 heart-touching songs or instrumental musics.
  • 6 exquisite game themes.
  • 3 levels of difficulty from easy to hard.
  • 3 leaderboards differentiated by difficulty levels.

Gameplay Overview:

Card Areas
  • The two top-left cells are the "Reserve Area".
  • The four top-right cells are the "Recycle Area".
  • The seven columns in the central region are the "Main Play Area".
Goal
  • By performing solitaire moves in the limited spaces of the "Main Play Area", continuously move cards of the same suit in ascending order into one of the cells in the "Recycle Area", ultimately moving all cards into the "Recycle Area".
Operations
  • Clicking on the left cell of the "Reserve Area" will flip the reserve card to the adjacent right cell. The top card on the right cell can be moved to the correct position in the "Main Play Area" or "Recycle Area".
  • Cards in the "Main Play Area" must be moved in descending order and of alternating colors. Except for the King (K), no other cards can be placed in an empty position.
  • Cards in a particular cell of the "Recycle Area" must be placed in ascending order and of the same suit.
